13/1/2024 ,updated on 16/1/2024, 11/3/20: TINDAKMALAYSIA NETWORK SERVICES PLT (TINDAK MALAYSIA)

Tindak Malaysia (2024), State of Sabah Government Gazette 1st April 1967 (for Contested Candidate Names), State of Sabah Government Gazette 10th May 1967 (for Uncontested Candidate Names and Election Results), Penyata pilihanraya umum Dewan Negeri, Sabah, 1967 (for information on Lost Deposit) Refer to 1967_OTHER_SOURCES for other source files

Constituency Codes and Names as per Sabah 1966 Delineation Map by EC. Government Gazette spells Bengkoka-Banggi as Bengkokka-Banggi and spells Pensiangan-Sook as Pensiangan Sook. Government Gazette has wrong values for Total Ballots Issued for Constituencies of Bengkoka- Banggi, Labuan, Pensiangan-Sook, Ranau, Sandakan Bandar and Lamag. There may be a presence for missing data points for age attribute for candidates. Sabah Alliance parties contested among themselves. Following are the SCA Candidates who used Alliance (Perikatan) flag instead of SCA - DATO PHANG THET TSUNG, KHOO SIAK CHIEW, MR. PETER LO SU YIN and CHAN FOO SANG. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives.
